text:
Lawrence Montaigne (February 26, 1931 – March 17, 2017) was an American actor, writer, dancer, and stuntman. As an actor, he was known for his appearances on many 1960s-era television shows such as "Star Trek". He was also known for his role as Haynes in "The Great Escape".
Montaigne died on March 17, 2017, at the age of 86.
